00023 #include "CibernateConnectionPool.h"

00032 CibernateConnectionPool::CibernateConnectionPool(int size,string dbName,string uname,string pass)
00033 {
00034         createPool(size,dbName,uname,pass);
00035 }
00036 
00037 CibernateConnectionPool::~CibernateConnectionPool()
00038 {
00039         for (int var = 0; var < readConnections.size(); ++var) {
00040                 delete readConnections.at(var);
00041         }
00042         for (int var = 0; var < writeConnections.size(); ++var) {
00043                 delete writeConnections.at(var);
00044         }
00045         SQLFreeHandle(SQL_HANDLE_ENV, V_OD_Env);
00046         cout << "\nDestructed CibernateConnectionPool" << flush;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void CibernateConnectionPool::closeConnection(Connection *conn)
00050 {
00051         conn->busy = false;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void  CibernateConnectionPool::newConnection(bool read)
00055 {
00056         int V_OD_erg;// result of functions
00057         SQLCHAR V_OD_msg[200],V_OD_stat[10];            // Status SQL;
00058         SQLSMALLINT     V_OD_mlen;
00059         SQLINTEGER V_OD_err_s;
00060         Connection *connection = new Connection;
00061         // 2. allocate connection handle, set timeout
00062         V_OD_erg = SQLAllocHandle(SQL_HANDLE_DBC, V_OD_Env, &(connection->conn));
00063         if ((V_OD_erg != SQL_SUCCESS) && (V_OD_erg != SQL_SUCCESS_WITH_INFO))
00064         {
00065                 printf("Error AllocHDB %d\n",V_OD_erg);
00066                 SQLFreeHandle(SQL_HANDLE_ENV, V_OD_Env);
00067                 this->initialized = false;
00068                 return;
00069                 //exit(0);
00070         }
00071         SQLSetConnectAttr(connection->conn, SQL_LOGIN_TIMEOUT, (SQLPOINTER *)5, 0);
00072         // 3. Connect to the datasource "MySQL-test"
00073         V_OD_erg = SQLConnect(connection->conn, (SQLCHAR*) this->dbName.c_str(), SQL_NTS,
00074                                                                          (SQLCHAR*) this->uname.c_str(), SQL_NTS,
00075                                                                          (SQLCHAR*) this->pass.c_str(), SQL_NTS);
00076         if ((V_OD_erg != SQL_SUCCESS) && (V_OD_erg != SQL_SUCCESS_WITH_INFO))
00077         {
00078                 printf("Error SQLConnect %d\n",V_OD_erg);
00079                 SQLGetDiagRec(SQL_HANDLE_DBC, connection->conn,1,
00080                                           V_OD_stat, &V_OD_err_s,V_OD_msg,100,&V_OD_mlen);
00081                 printf("%s (%d)\n",V_OD_msg,(int)V_OD_err_s);
00082                 SQLFreeHandle(SQL_HANDLE_ENV, V_OD_Env);
00083                 this->initialized = false;
00084                 return;
00085                 //exit(0);
00086         }
00087         connection->busy = false;
00088         connection->type = read;
00089         if(read)
00090                 this->readConnections.push_back(connection);
00091         else
00092                 this->writeConnections.push_back(connection);
00093 
00094 }
00095 
00096 void CibernateConnectionPool::createPool(int size,string dbName,string uname,string pass)
00097 {
00098         this->dbName = dbName;
00099         this->uname = uname;
00100         this->pass = pass;
00101         this->readNumber = 0;
00102         int reads = round(size/5);
00103         if(reads<1)
00104                 reads = 1;
00105         int V_OD_erg;// result of functions
00106         // 1. allocate Environment handle and register version
00107         this->initialized = true;
00108         V_OD_erg=SQLAllocHandle(SQL_HANDLE_ENV,SQL_NULL_HANDLE,&V_OD_Env);
00109         if ((V_OD_erg != SQL_SUCCESS) && (V_OD_erg != SQL_SUCCESS_WITH_INFO))
00110         {
00111                 printf("Error AllocHandle\n");
00112                 this->initialized = false;
00113         }
00114         V_OD_erg=SQLSetEnvAttr(V_OD_Env, SQL_ATTR_ODBC_VERSION, (void*)SQL_OV_ODBC3, 0);
00115         if((V_OD_erg != SQL_SUCCESS) && (V_OD_erg != SQL_SUCCESS_WITH_INFO))
00116         {
00117                 printf("Error SetEnv\n");
00118                 SQLFreeHandle(SQL_HANDLE_ENV, V_OD_Env);
00119                 this->initialized = false;
00120         }
00121         for(int i=0;i<reads;i++)
00122         {
00123                 this->newConnection(true);
00124                 if(!this->initialized)
00125                         break;
00126         }
00127         for(int i=0;i<size-reads;i++)
00128         {
00129                 this->newConnection(false);
00130                 if(!this->initialized)
00131                         break;
00132         }
00133         if(!this->initialized)
00134         {
00135                 printf("Failed to create pool !\n");
00136         }
00137         else
00138                 printf("Created pool successfully !\n");
00139 }
00140 
00141 Connection* CibernateConnectionPool::getReadConnection()
00142 {
00143         if(this->readNumber==(int)this->readConnections.size())
00144                 this->readNumber = 0;
00145         return this->readConnections.at(this->readNumber++);
00146 }
00147 Connection* CibernateConnectionPool::getWriteConnection()
00148 {
00149         Timer t;
00150         t.start();
00151         while(true)
00152         {
00153                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<this->writeConnections.size();i++)
00154                 {
00155                         if(!this->writeConnections.at(i)->busy)
00156                                 return this->writeConnections.at(i);
00157                 }
00158                 if(t.elapsedMilliSeconds()>500)
00159                 {
00160                         newConnection(false);
00161                         return this->writeConnections.at(this->writeConnections.size()-1);
00162                 }
00163 
00164         }
00165 }
